mapper.select: select article_id from column_article where column_id = #{columnId} order by `section` asc
select article_id from column_article where column_id = #{columnId} and `section` = #{section} limit 1
select count(distinct u.user_id) from column_article as a left join user_foot as u on a.article_id = u.document_id where u.document_type = 1 and u.read_stat = 1 and a.column_id = #{columnId}
